name: Pinoseeo
description:
Created for the Epic Megajam 2022 - "As above, so below"

One of your dancing robots has broken down!
Sit in the rafters and control it like a puppet to keep the show going.

Use the levers to control each limb of the robot and try to match the pose you see on the cards. You can't see your puppet until after you've locked in a pose, then you'll be scored based on how accurate your pose is to the target.

Entered for the "Army of One" and "Tiny but Mighty" modifiers.

Created by Tom Malinowski

Pre-existing assets:
Music - Kevin Gallagher
Audio effects (freesound.org, UniversalSoundFX)
Misc normal maps and skeletal mesh - Epic Games
Font - Josefin-Sans (https://www.fontsquirrel.com/license/josefin-sans)
